titles.title: This World Is Not My Home

verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
The angels beck-on me from heaven’s open door,
And I can’t feel at home
in this world anymore.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
The angels beckon me from heaven’s open door,
And I can’t feel at home in this world anymore.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
I know He’ll take me thru
tho I am weak and poor.
And I can’t feel at home in this world anymore.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
I have a loving mother
up in glory land,
I don’t expect to stop
until I shake her hand;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
She’s waiting now for me in heaven’s open door,
And I can’t feel at home
in this world anymore.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Just up in glory land
we’ll live eternally,
The saints on ev’ry hand
are shouting victory;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Their song of sweetest praise drift back from heaven’s shore,
And I can’t feel at home
in this world anymore.
